error.cause.page.invalid.content: The value of the URL parameter `page` must be a positive integer.

error.cause.page.out_of_bounds.content: The value of the URL parameter `page` must not exceed ${pageCount}, the page count.

error.cause.per_page.invalid.content: The value of the URL parameter `per_page` must be a positive integer.

error.cause.sort.conflict.content: The URL parameters `sort_asc` and `sort_desc` cannot be specified simultaneously.

error.cause.sort.unknown.content: The value of the URL parameter `${paramName}` is not a known sorting column.
